reviewText: I bought this for my niece's birthday, her and my nephew really seemed to enjoy it.

Chi's sweet home dvds are amazing. The story is slightly different from the book,but still adorable. It has perfect voice actors,and cute animation! This anime is absoulutely wonderful,and people of all ages will love it. If you are a chi's sweet home fan,I would recommend this anime!
This show is unbelievably cute. To the point where everyone in my family enjoyed it. Young or old it didn't matter. Great show
